Class TreeSeasonInfo

java.lang.Object
com.NBA_Rankings_Scores_Project.Tree.Tree
com.NBA_Rankings_Scores_Project.Tree.TreeSeasonInfo
public class TreeSeasonInfo
extends Tree
Tree with the general info of the season (teams, players and conferences)
